oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: In the Land of Salvation and Sin
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Woodcuts (prints);
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Two color postcard (red and green on white) promoting the Georgia Satellite's album In the Land of Salvation and Sin. Postcard is based on an 1950s poster featuring a woodcut of a woman wearing a sandwich board.
